title: Bitcoin hash rate sets new records ahead of difficulty adjustment
description:
Quick Take Bitcoin is witnessing a significant surge in its hash rate, with the recent figures setting new single-day records. On Dec. 1, the hash rate reached a high of 578 eh/s, followed by another notable surge on Nov. 3, where it achieved 558 eh/s. Amid this surge, the Bitcoin network is less than a […]

The post Bitcoin hash rate sets new records ahead of difficulty adjustment appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Exchange KuCoin on ‘the Potential of Bitcoin’s Santa Claus Rally in 2023’
description: According to a recent blog post by crypto exchange KuCoin, the concept of a Santa Claus Rally in Bitcoin, akin to that in stock markets, is generating interest as 2023 ends. This phenomenon, usually boosting stock prices during late December to early January, is now being eyed in the crypto market, particularly for Bitcoin. KuCoin […]

title: Blockstream’s Adam Back bets Bitcoin could reach $1m after 2024 halving
description: In a recent series of X posts, the head of Blockstream Adam Back said the largest by market cap cryptocurrency might surge to $100k before the 2024 halving. According to the Blockstream CEO, Bitcoin (BTC) “will surely flip physical gold…

title: Ripple’s XRP Price Expected to Surge 500% to $3 Upon XRP ETF Approval and ‘Floodgates’ Opening
description: One top researcher says that an XRP ETF would open the floodgates as institutional investors would be able to seamlessly make an entry into the XRP world. ETFs also bring about a sharp increase in liquidity for any asset as the type of customers targeted by ETFs are deep-pocketed and invest billions of dollars into [...]

title: Can Somebody Guess Your Wallet’s Seed Phrase?
description:
If you are active in the crypto space, chances are that you have at least one crypto wallet. You most likely have more than only one wallet. Many chains have their specific wallets. As a result, active crypto users can have well over 50 different wallets.  Now, each wallet also has its own seed phrase. […]

The post Can Somebody Guess Your Wallet’s Seed Phrase? appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: LUNC 72% Surge Driven by Community Members Unity: Analyst
description:
In a recent video, Clay, the host of the YouTube channel ClayBro, stated that the upward surge in Terra Classic’s (LUNC) price is proof of the unity within its community members to grow the blockchain.  Indeed, the crypto analyst and reputed member of the Terra Luna community made these statements following a tremendous surge in […]

The post LUNC 72% Surge Driven by Community Members Unity: Analyst appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Analyst Backs Coinbase CEO on Bitcoin’s Western Role
description:
In a recent exchange on X, Christopher Calicott, founder of TVP, expressed a powerful sentiment about Bitcoin. Calicott stated that Bitcoin encapsulates the promise of property rights that has underpinned the flourishing of the West. Calicott’s tweet was in response to a tweet by Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong, who had been contemplating the role of […]

The post Analyst Backs Coinbase CEO on Bitcoin’s Western Role appeared first on Coin Edition.
